import {useSelector, useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import { addPreference,removePreference,getPopularityListing } from "../redux/actions"; import { useState } from "react"; import Listing from "./Listing"; const Search = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const updatePreference = (language) => { if (language.target.checked) { console.log(language.target.value + " checked") dispatch(addPreference(language.target.value)); } else { console.log(language.target.value + " unchecked") dispatch(removePreference(language.target.value)); } } return( <>
Customize search

) } export default Search
